港交所.definition: Hong Kong Stock Exchange; abbr. for 香港交易所

港北.definition: Gangbei district of Guigang city 貴港市|贵港市[Gui4 gang3 shi4], Guangxi

港北區.definition: Gangbei district of Guigang city 貴港市|贵港市[Gui4 gang3 shi4], Guangxi

港區國安法.definition: Hong Kong National Security Law (from 30th June 2020)

港南.definition: Gangnan district of Guigang city 貴港市|贵港市[Gui4 gang3 shi4], Guangxi

港南區.definition: Gangnan district of Guigang city 貴港市|贵港市[Gui4 gang3 shi4], Guangxi

港口區.definition: Gangkou district of Fangchenggang city 防城港市[Fang2 cheng2 gang3 shi4], Guangxi

港島.definition: Hong Kong Island; abbr. for 香港島|香港岛[Xiang1 gang3 dao3]

港幣.definition: Hong Kong currency; Hong Kong dollar

港普.definition: Hong Kong pidgin (a mix of Standard Mandarin and Cantonese)

港深.definition: abbr. for Hong Kong 香港[Xiang1 gang3] and Shenzhen 深圳[Shen1 zhen4]

港澳.definition: Hong Kong 香港[Xiang1 gang3] and Macao 澳門|澳门[Ao4 men2]

港澳臺.definition: Hong Kong 香港, Macao 澳門|澳门 and Taiwan 臺灣|台湾[Tai2 wan1]

港澳辦.definition: Hong Kong and Macao Affairs Office of the State Council (abbr. for 國務院港澳事務辦公室|国务院港澳事务办公室[Guo2 wu4 yuan4 Gang3 Ao4 Shi4 wu4 Ban4 gong1 shi4])

港珠澳.definition: Hong Kong, Zhuhai and Macau (abbr. for 香港[Xiang1 gang3] + 珠海[Zhu1 hai3] + 澳門|澳门[Ao4 men2])

港督.definition: governor of Hong Kong (during the period of British rule, 1841-1997)

港英政府.definition: British colonial administration of Hong Kong 1837-1941 and 1945-1997

港龍航空.definition: Hong Kong Dragon Airlines (operating as Dragonair), Hong Kong-based international airline
